spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is strong. Minor discrepancies in door swing directions for BED-3 and BED-4. The transition from the Living area to the Deck contains a slight misalignment in the wall depth compared to the 2D plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms are present and correctly adjacent. Wall thickness is consistent. Small structural hallucination found in the utility area where a partition wall is slightly elongated compared to the source.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent mapping of furniture layouts, including the specific rug in the living room and the dining table configuration. Slight scaling issue with the chair in the foyer.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality isometric projection. Lighting and shadows are realistic and help define the space. Geometry is clean with no significant artifacts.

detected_errors.description: Internal door swing for BED-3 and BED-4 do not match the 2D plan orientation.
Extra partition segment hallucinated in the bottom-right utility/toilet junction.
Foyer furniture (chair) appears slightly oversized relative to the entrance hall width.
